title: My Unity license was activated manually and cannot be returned
labels: Serial Exceeds Maximum Number Of Activations
serial exceed maximum number of artivations

sections.title: Â Symptoms
content:
• I have am trying to reactivate Unity
  • I am receiving this error:

sections.title: Cause
content: If you cannot activate due to an inconsistent internet connection, you may need to activate manually. Doing so, you may not be able to return your license via your web account.

sections.title: Resolution
content: In this case you will need to contact Support. We can clear the existing activations for you, making it possible to reactivate successfully.
Please get in touch with us here.
When contacting Support, please provide your license serial number.
Please read the Manual Activation Guide for further instructions on how to manually activate your license.
